## Set Up chunk
```{r}
#| label: set up
#| message: false
library(tidyverse) #general use package of data frames
library(lterdatasampler) #package of fata drames 

data("pie_crab") # importing pie_crab data 
```


# New Section: exploratory visualization
```{r}
#| label: latitude size plot
# base layer for plot
ggplot(data = pie_crab, #data is pie_crab
       aes(x = latitude, #x is lat
           y = size, #y is size 
           color = site)) +
  geom_point()+ 
  theme_minimal() #changing theme to minimal
```
